input_text:
Job Title: Application Developer

Location: Seattle, WA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Consulting, Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Job Number: 24-01195

Do you want to work where innovation drives business? Eclaro is looking for an Application Developer for our client in Seattle, WA. 

Eclaro’s client is a future-focused technology solutions provider recognized throughout the world for their original approach to overcoming challenges. Make your impact as a part of our team!

Responsibilities: 

Design and Develop integrations using MuleSoft's AnyPoint Platform. Communicate and collaborate with various stakeholders to understand requirements of Integration solutions. Assist in technical POC's to create integration solutions. Use reusable artifacts, standards, templates, guidelines, patterns. Ensure the corporate guidelines and code quality criteria are met in every phase of delivery. Support post deployment activities including knowledge transfer, process documentation and application bug fixes. Leverage technical knowledge to assist application teams in identification and resolution of Integration related issues. Implementation of web standards relating to APIs (OAuth, SSL, JWT, etc.) and identity providers. 

Required Qualifications: 

3+ years of experience working in enterprise application integration. 3+ years of experience with MuleSoft Products and features. At least 1 1 project implementation experience in MuleSoft. Experience in working with AnyPoint platform including API Manager, Design Center, Runtime Manager, Monitoring, Exchange etc. Hands on experience working on GraphQL. API-led experience with OpenAPI 3.x and mapping to RAML. Experience on CI / CD tools to automate dev, test, build, deployment. Experience in using code repositories e.g. GitHub. Understanding of MuleSoft deployment options and related terms including CloudHub etc. Hands-on development experience in RAML, Flow, Sub flow, Message Processor, Connectors, scopes, flow control, error handling, Dataweave 2.x Transformation etc. Experience in working with various industry technical standards SFTP, JDBC, JMS, JSON, MIME, REST, YAML, SSL, etc. Experience in standards relating to APIs (OAuth, SSL, JWT, etc.) and identity providers etc. Experience with Postman collections for testing. 

Pay Rate: $51.18 / hr.

If hired, you will enjoy the following Eclaro Benefits:

401k Retirement Savings Plan administered by Merrill LynchCommuter Check Pretax Commuter BenefitsEligibility to purchase Medical, Dental & Vision Insurance through Eclaro

If interested, you may contact:

Steve Adams

Steve.Adams@eclaro.com

866-577-3379

Steve Adams | LinkedIn

Equal Opportunity Employer: Eclaro values diversity and does not discriminate based on Race, Color, Religion, Sex, Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity, National Origin, Age, Genetic Information, Disability, Protected Veteran Status, or any other legally protected group status.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
